alert.note: Alert for Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 11:40AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH VERY HEAVY RAIN WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA AND AITKIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CDT... At 1139 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Grand Rapids, to near Garrison, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph, and very heavy rainfall with significantly reduced visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grand Rapids, Mille Lacs Lake, Aitkin, Coleraine, Hill City, Taconite and Gunn around 1140 AM CDT. Palisade around 1150 AM CDT. Warba around 1155 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca
